name: Walkable 360 Video
summary:
You can experience VR video as real as ever!
VR usually cannot close up or walk around because there is some gaps between a point where a player stands and a ground which 360 degree footage shows.  However, this new VR called "Walkable 360 Video", you can walk around as if you were there because it creates three dimension not using Stereo Panorama which takes photo with two lenses like our eyes so that it depicts as if you are seeing 3D picture or photogrammetry.

■Operation Method
Touch Controller
 ...
